item.description:
Please email Rich Wheeler at richardhwheeler@yahoo.com to RSVP for this event.

The MA Young Republicans is organizing this event at Mantra:

"Please join the MA Young Republicans as we kick of the start of summer with this FREE event open to all, courtesy of SVEDKA vodka. Please come sample great summer drinks, see old friends, meet new ones. If you have received emails before but were too busy, please join us. We are looking to grow our group and want to see many new faces. Please note that this event is a 21+ event. Thanks."

This event is organized by the MA Young Republicans. You can indicate here on the Meetup site whether you'll be attending, but please email Rich Wheeler at richardhwheeler@yahoo.com to receive the Evite and RSVP.
item.name: MA YR: "Put the 'pub' back in Republican"
